abilities.name: Incredible Initiative
abilities.description: You react more quickly than others can. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to initiative rolls.

abilities.name: Expansive Spellstrike
abilities.description: You've adapted a wider array of spells to work with your attacks. Rather than needing to use a spell that has a spell attack roll for a Spellstrike, you can use a harmful spell that can target a creature or that has an area of a burst, cone, or line (abiding by any other restrictions of Spellstrike). When you Cast a Spell that doesn't have a spell attack roll as part of a Spellstrike, it works in the following ways.

abilities.name: Spellstrike
abilities.description:
You channel a spell into a punch or sword thrust to deliver a combined attack. You Cast a Spell that takes 1 or 2 actions to cast and requires a spell attack roll. The effects of the spell don't occur immediately but are imbued into your attack instead. Make a melee Strike with a weapon or unarmed attack. Your spell is coupled with your attack, using your attack roll result to determine the effects of both the Strike and the spell. This counts as two attacks for your multiple attack penalty, but you don't apply the penalty until after you've completed the Spellstrike. The infusion of spell energy grants your Strike the arcane trait, making it magical. 
After you use Spellstrike, you can't do so again until you recharge your Spellstrike as a single action, which has the concentrate trait. You also recharge your Spellstrike when you cast a conflux spell that takes at least 1 action to cast; casting a focus spell of another type doesn't recharge your Spellstrike

abilities.name: Arcane Cascade
abilities.description:
Requirements: You used your most recent action to Cast a Spell or make a Spellstrike. You need to meet this requirement only to enter the stance, not to remain in it. 
You divert a portion of the spell’s magical power and keep it cycling through your body and weapon using specialized forms, breathing, or footwork. While you’re in the stance, your melee Strikes deal 1 extra damage. This damage increases to 2 if you have weapon specialization and 3 if you have greater weapon specialization. Any Strike that benefits from this damage gains the arcane trait, making it magical. .

abilities.name: Distracting Spellstrike
abilities.description:
Requirements: You're in Arcane Cascade stance and have a hand free. 
You weave distracting magic with one hand to enhance your Spellstrike. Make a Spellstrike and Feint against the target of your Strike. Do this immediately before making the Strike, but after choosing your target. The Feint gains the arcane, illusion, and visual traits, and it always has the basic effects of a Feint, rather than applying any adjustments or alternate effects from other feats or abilities.

abilities.name: Laughing Shadow
abilities.description:
Magic is freeing, a means to your ends, and you can use it to go where you want, do as you please, and avoid the consequences. You are a laughing shadow of spell and blade, always one step ahead of your foes, always with a trick up your sleeve. 
While in Arcane Cascade stance, you gain a +5-foot status bonus to your Speeds, or a +10-foot bonus if you’re unarmored. If you have a free hand while in the stance and are attacking a flat-footed creature, you increase the extra damage to 3, to 5 if you have weapon specialization, or to 7 if you have greater weapon specialization. You must have your other hand completely free; the extra damage doesn’t apply if you have a free-hand weapon or other item in that hand, even if you would normally be able to use the hand for other things.

abilities.name: Magus's Analysis
abilities.description: You make an assessment informed by your knowledge of how a creature fights. Attempt a check to Recall Knowledge about a creature. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your check if you previously hit the creature with a Strike this turn. If your check is successful, recharge your Spellstrike. The subject of your check is temporarily immune to Magus's Analysis for 1 day.

abilities.name: Cognitive Crossover
abilities.description:
Trigger: You gain no information from a Recall Knowledge check (usually because you failed the secret check) using one of the two skills you chose for this feat. 
You immediately reattempt the triggering check using the other chosen skill. 
Special When you gain this feat, choose two of the following skills: Arcana, Crafting, Lore (any one), Medicine, Nature, Occultism, Religion, or Society.

abilities.name: Knowledge is Power
abilities.description: When you critically succeed at a Recall Knowledge check about a creature, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll against the creature, to your AC against its next attack roll, and to your save against its next effect requiring a save. If you share this information with your allies, they gain the benefits as well. If not used, these bonuses end after 1 minute.

abilities.name: Dimensional Assault
abilities.description: You tumble through space, making a short dimensional hop to better position yourself for an attack. Teleport to any square in range that's within reach of a creature, and then make a melee Strike against one creature within your reach.

abilities.name: Acid Splash
abilities.description: You splash a glob of acid that splatters your target and nearby creatures. Make a spell attack. If you hit, you deal 1d6 acid damage plus 1 splash acid damage. On a critical success, the target also takes 1 persistent acid damage. Heightened (3rd) The initial damage increases to 1d6 + your spellcasting ability modifier, and the persistent damage increases to 2. Heightened (5th) The initial damage increases to 2d6 + your spellcasting ability modifier, the persistent damage increases to 3, and the splash damage increases to 2. Heightened (7th) The initial damage increases to 3d6 + your spellcasting ability modifier, the persistent damage increases to 4, and the splash damage increases to 3. Heightened (9th) The initial damage increases to 4d6 + your spellcasting ability modifier, the persistent damage increases to 5, and the splash damage increases to 4.

abilities.name: Electric Arc
abilities.description: An arc of lightning leaps from one target to another. You deal electricity damage equal to 1d4 plus your spellcasting ability modifier. Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d4.

abilities.name: Produce Flame
abilities.description: A small ball of flame appears in the palm of your hand, and you lash out with it either in melee or at range. Make a spell attack roll against your target's AC. This is normally a ranged attack, but you can also make a melee attack against a creature in your unarmed reach. On a success, you deal 1d4 plus your spellcasting ability modifier fire damage. On a critical success, the target takes double damage and 1d4 persistent fire damage. Heightened (+1) Increase the damage by 1d4 and the persistent damage on a critical hit by 1d4.

abilities.name: Ray of Frost
abilities.description: You blast an icy ray. Make a spell attack roll. The ray deals cold damage equal to 1d4 plus your spellcasting ability modifier. Critical Success The target takes double damage and takes a -10-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 round. Success The target takes normal damage. Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d4.

abilities.name: Shield
abilities.description: You raise a magical shield of force. This counts as using the Raise a Shield action, giving you a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn, but it doesn't require a hand to use. While the spell is in effect, you can use the Shield Block reaction with your magic shield. The shield has Hardness 5. After you use Shield Block, the spell ends and you can't cast it again for 10 minutes. Unlike a normal Shield Block, you can use the spell's reaction against the magic missile spell. Heightening the spell increases the shield's Hardness. Heightened (3rd) The shield has Hardness 10. Heightened (5th) The shield has Hardness 15. Heightened (7th) The shield has Hardness 20. Heightened (9th) The shield has Hardness 25.

abilities.name: Horizon Thunder Sphere
abilities.description: You gather magical energy into your palm, forming a concentrated ball of electricity that crackles and rumbles like impossibly distant thunder. Make a ranged spell attack roll against your target's AC. On a success, you deal 3d6 electricity damage. On a critical success, the target takes double damage and is dazzled for 1 round. The number of actions you spend when Casting this Spell determines the range and other parameters. [two-actions] (somatic, verbal) This spell has a range of 30 feet. [three-actions] (material, somatic, verbal) This spell has a range of 60 feet and deals half damage on a failure (but not a critical failure) as the electricity lashes out and jolts the target. Two Rounds If you spend 3 actions Casting the Spell, you can avoid finishing the spell and spend another 3 actions on your next turn to empower the spell even further. If you do, after attacking the target, whether you hit or miss, the ball of lightning explodes, dealing 2d6 electricity damage to all other creatures in a 10‑foot emanation around the target (basic Reflex save). Additionally, you spark with electricity for 1 minute, dealing 1 electricity damage to creatures that Grab you or that hit you with an unarmed Strike or a non-reach melee weapon. Heightened (+1) The initial damage on a hit, as well as the burst damage for two-round casting time, each increase by 2d6, and the damage creatures take if they Grapple or hit you while you're in your sparking state increases by 1.
abilities.area: Range varies; Target 1 creature; Area 10-foot emanation (burst)

abilities.name: Invisibility
abilities.description: Cloaked in illusion, the target becomes invisible. This makes it undetected to all creatures, though the creatures can attempt to find the target, making it hidden to them instead (page 466). If the target uses a hostile action, the spell ends after that hostile action is completed. Heightened (4th) The spell lasts 1 minute, but it doesn't end if the target uses a hostile action.

abilities.name: Mirror Image
abilities.description: Three illusory images of you swirl about your space, potentially causing those who attack you to hit one of the images instead of you. Any attack that would hit you has a random chance of hitting one of your images instead of you. If all three images remain, there is a 1 in 4 chance of hitting you (1 on 1d4). With two images remaining, there is a 1 in 3 chance of hitting you (1-2 on 1d6). With only one image, the chances are 1 in 2 (1-3 on 1d6). Once an image is hit, it is destroyed. If an attack roll fails to hit your AC but doesn't critically fail, it destroys an image but has no additional effect (even if the attack would normally have an effect on a failure). If an attack roll is a critical success and would hit one of the images, one of the images is destroyed and the attack roll becomes a success against you. Once all the images are destroyed, the spell ends.

abilities.name: Fireball
abilities.description: A roaring blast of fire appears at a spot you designate, dealing 6d6 fire damage. Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.

abilities.name: Shield
abilities.description: You raise a magical shield of force that grants +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn and lets you use Shield Block (Hardness 5; higher when heightened). After you Shield Block, the spell ends and you can’t recast it for 10 minutes.

abilities.name: Divine Lance
abilities.description: Unleash a beam of divine energy keyed to one of your deity’s alignments. Make a ranged spell attack; on a hit the target takes 1d4 + ability modifier damage of that alignment (×2 on a critical). Heightened +1: damage +1d4.

abilities.name: Haunting Hymn
abilities.description: Emit a jarring hymn dealing sonic damage equal to your spellcasting modifier; basic Fortitude save. On a critical failure the creature is deafened 1 minute. Heightened +2: damage +1d6.

abilities.name: Stabilize
abilities.description: Positive energy ends the target’s dying condition, leaving it unconscious at 0 HP.

abilities.name: Light
abilities.description: An object glows, shedding bright light in a 20-ft radius (dim 20 ft beyond) until your next daily preparations. Casting Light on another object ends the first. Heightened (4th): bright 60 ft / dim 60 ft.
abilities.area: Range touch; Target 1 unattended or willing object ≤ 1 Bulk

abilities.name: Bless
abilities.description: You and allies in the emanation gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls for 1 minute. Each turn thereafter, spend 1 action (concentrate) to expand the radius by 5 ft. Counteracts Bane.

abilities.name: Create Water
abilities.description: Create 2 gallons of water that evaporate after 1 day if unused.

abilities.name: Helpful Steps
abilities.description: Conjure a wooden ladder or spiral staircase up to 40 ft tall for 10 minutes (Dismissible). Heightened +1: maximum height +40 ft.

abilities.name: Resist Energy
abilities.description: Target gains resistance 5 to a chosen energy (acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic) for 10 minutes. Heightened (4th): resistance 10, up to 2 targets. Heightened (7th): resistance 15, up to 5 targets.

abilities.name: Create Food
abilities.description: Create enough bland but nourishing food for 6 Medium creatures (proportionate for other sizes) that spoils after 1 day. Heightened (4th): feeds 12; (6th): 50; (8th): 200.
abilities.area: Range 30 ft; Effect food appears in chosen space

abilities.name: Inner Radiance Torrent
abilities.description: Fires force bolts in a 60-ft line (2 actions) or 120-ft line (3 actions) dealing 4d4 force damage; basic Reflex save, critical failure also blinds 1 round. Optional 2-round casting for +4d4 damage and a 1-minute shining aura (1 force damage to adjacent creatures). Heightened +1: both damages +2d4, aura damage +1.
abilities.area: Range —; Area line 60 ft or 120 ft

abilities.name: Heroism
abilities.description: Target gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, Perception checks, saving throws, and skill checks for 10 minutes. Heightened (6th): +2; (9th): +3.

abilities.name: Blindness
abilities.description: Attempt to blind a creature (Fortitude save). Critical Success: unaffected. Success: blinded until its next turn. Failure: blinded 1 minute. Critical Failure: blinded permanently. Target then gains 1-minute immunity.

abilities.name: Thief Racket
abilities.description: You specialize in stealthy theft. Add Dexterity modifier instead of Strength to finesse melee weapon damage. Trained in Thievery.

abilities.name: Sneak Attack
abilities.description: Deal extra 1d6 precision damage against flat-footed foes with agile/finesse melee or ranged attacks. Dice increase at levels 5, 11, and 17.

abilities.name: Surprise Attack
abilities.description: On first combat round, creatures that haven’t acted are flat-footed to you if you rolled Deception or Stealth for initiative.

abilities.name: Weapon Tricks
abilities.description: Expert proficiency with simple weapons, rapier, sap, shortbow, shortsword, and unarmed attacks. On critical hits against flat-footed creatures using agile or finesse weapons, apply critical specialization effects.

abilities.name: Escape
abilities.description: Interact to draw and scatter playing cards, granting brief concealment and allowing Sneak until end of turn.

abilities.name: Expanded Luck
abilities.description: You can trigger Cat's Luck on failed or critically failed Fortitude or Will saves, once per day.

abilities.name: Gang Up
abilities.description: Enemies within reach and flank of you and an ally are flat-footed against your melee attacks.

abilities.name: Tumble Behind (Rogue)
abilities.description: When you successfully Tumble Through, the foe you pass is flat-footed against your next attack this turn.

abilities.name: You're Next
abilities.description: After reducing a foe to 0 HP, make Intimidation check with +2 bonus to Demoralize another visible foe. Legendary proficiency allows free action use.

abilities.name: Clawed Catfolk
abilities.description: You have long, sharp claws dealing 1d6 slashing damage with agile, finesse, and unarmed traits.

abilities.name: Dread Striker
abilities.description: Enemies with frightened condition are flat-footed against your attacks.

abilities.name: Cat Fall
abilities.description: You treat falls as 10 feet shorter. Expert in Acrobatics treats falls as 25 feet shorter, master as 50 feet shorter, legendary always lands on feet with no damage.

abilities.name: Cat's Luck
abilities.description: Once per day, reroll a failed Reflex save and use the better result.

abilities.name: Catfolk Dance
abilities.description: Make Acrobatics check against adjacent creature's Reflex DC to impose -2 penalty and flat-footed status on critical success; -2 penalty on success.

abilities.name: Intimidating Glare
abilities.description: Demoralize with a glare; loses auditory trait, gains visual trait, no language penalty.

abilities.name: Pickpocket
abilities.description: Steal or palm objects without –5 penalty if closely guarded. Master thieves can steal during combat with more actions and penalties.

abilities.name: Quiet Allies
abilities.description: When avoiding notice with allies, roll a single Stealth check using the lowest modifier instead of rolling separately.

abilities.name: Sign Language
abilities.description: Learn and use sign languages associated with known languages; harder to use in combat or low visibility.

abilities.name: Steady Balance
abilities.description: Success on Balance action counts as critical success; not flat-footed on narrow or uneven surfaces; may use Acrobatics instead of Reflex to Grab an Edge.

abilities.name: Deny Advantage
abilities.description: You aren’t flat-footed to hidden, undetected, or flanking creatures of your level or lower, or creatures using surprise attack. They can still help allies flank.

abilities.name: Land on Your Feet
abilities.description: You take half damage and do not land prone when you fall.

abilities.name: Low-Light Vision
abilities.description: See in dim light as though bright and ignore concealed condition from dim light.

abilities.name: Rage
abilities.description: Activate your inner fury to begin raging. Gain temporary HP equal to your level plus Constitution modifier for up to 1 minute or until no enemies are perceived or you fall unconscious. You cannot voluntarily end Rage. While raging, deal +2 damage with melee/unarmed attacks (halved if agile), take -1 AC penalty, and can only use actions with the rage trait or Seek. After Rage ends, lose remaining temporary HP and cannot Rage again for 1 minute.

abilities.name: Giant Instinct
abilities.description: Your rage grants the power and presence of a giant. You may disdain giants or aspire to defeat them, but others see your exceptional strength and larger-than-life ego. Failing to face personal strength challenges is forbidden (Anathema). You can wield Large weapons if Small/Medium, or weapons one size larger otherwise. While wielding such weapons, your Rage damage increases from +2 to +6 but you suffer Clumsy 1 condition, which cannot be removed while wielding. At level 7, Rage damage increases to +10 (or +18 with Greater Weapon Specialization). At level 9, you gain resistance to bludgeoning and one chosen energy type: cold, electricity, or fire.

abilities.name: Titan Mauler (Instinct Ability)
abilities.description: You can wield Large weapons if Small/Medium, or one size larger if not. Rage damage increases from +2 to +6 but you gain Clumsy 1 condition while wielding such weapons, which cannot be removed.

abilities.name: Sudden Charge
abilities.description: Stride twice to rush an enemy and make a melee Strike if ending movement within melee reach. Usable while Burrowing, Climbing, Flying, or Swimming if you have those movement types.

abilities.name: Swipe
abilities.description: Make one melee Strike targeting up to two adjacent foes within reach. Damage rolled once and applied to each. Counts as two attacks for multiple attack penalty. Sweep trait modifiers apply to all attacks.

abilities.name: Titan Wrestler
abilities.description: Attempt Disarm, Grapple, Shove, or Trip on creatures up to two sizes larger (three if legendary in Athletics).

abilities.name: Brutality
abilities.description: Your fury makes your weapons lethal. You gain expert proficiency with simple weapons, martial weapons, and unarmed attacks. While raging, you access critical specialization effects for melee and unarmed attacks.

abilities.name: Constructed (Android)
abilities.description: Your synthetic body grants a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against diseases, poisons, and radiation.

abilities.name: Emotionally Unaware
abilities.description: You take a –1 circumstance penalty to Diplomacy and Performance checks, and on Perception checks to Sense Motive.

abilities.name: Deny Advantage
abilities.description: You aren’t flat-footed to hidden, undetected, or flanking creatures of your level or lower, or creatures of your level or lower using surprise attack. However, foes can still help allies flank.

abilities.name: Assurance (Intimidation)
abilities.description: Choose a trained skill and forgo rolling checks to get a result of 10 + proficiency bonus (no other modifiers). Can be selected multiple times for different skills.

abilities.name: Giant's Stature
abilities.description: If Medium or smaller with Giant Instinct, grow to Large, increase reach by 5 feet, gain Clumsy 1 condition while raging, and your equipment scales accordingly.

abilities.name: Intimidating Glare
abilities.description: Demoralize using a glare; loses auditory trait, gains visual trait, and no penalty if target doesn't understand your language.

abilities.name: Intimidating Prowess
abilities.description: With Strength 16+ and expert Intimidation, gain +1 circumstance bonus on Intimidation checks when physically menacing. Ignore language penalties. Bonus increases to +2 if Strength 20+ and master Intimidation.

abilities.name: Nanite Shroud
abilities.description: Android nanites conceal you for half your level in rounds. Cannot be used to Hide or Sneak. Prevents use of other nanite abilities while active.

abilities.name: Nanite Surge
abilities.description: Once per hour, after a skill check requiring three or fewer actions, gain +2 status bonus to that check and emit dim light in 10-foot radius for 1 round.

abilities.name: Raging Intimidation
abilities.description: While raging, your Demoralize and Scare to Death actions gain the rage trait allowing their use. Grants Intimidating Glare and Scare to Death feats once prerequisites are met.

abilities.name: Steady Balance
abilities.description: When using the Balance action successfully, treat it as a critical success. Not flat-footed on narrow or uneven surfaces. May use Acrobatics instead of Reflex to Grab an Edge.
